name: Better Open and Close Tabs
description: When closing a chrome tab with the given command, the next tab to ativate will be the one to the left of the active tab being closed. When opening a new tab using the given command, it will open to the right of the currently active tab. Note: you must remap the keybindings for the default "Close Tab" and "New Tab" commands if you want to use the default keybindings that come with this extension

browser_action.default_title: Press Command+W to close and Command+T to open tabs

close-current-tab.description: Close current tab, activate tab to right. Open default newtab page if last tab is closed

add-a-new-tab.description: Opens new tab to the right of current tab
